# FaceObservation.CaptureQuality

**Structure**

An indicator of the quality of a face capture.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CaptureQuality
```

## Getting the score

- **score**: A value that indicates the quality of the face capture.

## Accessing the originating descriptor

- **originatingRequestDescriptor**: The descriptor of the request that produced the capture quality.

## Getting the capture quality

- **captureQuality**: The quality of the face capture.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
